summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5717 for the improvement of 38th Avenue Southwest, from West Kenyon Street to West Holden Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75533 as amended by Ordinance Nos. 76829 and 77742, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
